rows.label: tlk41300012_02_msg0001
rows.name:
I heard someone destroyed the
water tower in Torigoth.

rows.label: tlk41300012_02_msg0002
rows.name:
If I don't do anything when
my hometown is in trouble, I
can't call myself a Gulan.

rows.label: tlk41300012_02_msg0003
rows.name:
For now, I've sent a lot of
iron materials. I hope they
can use it for repairs...

rows.label: tlk41300012_02_msg0004
rows.name:
I wonder who the culprit is?
Could it be that "Iira" group
everyone's rumoring about?
